WorkItem.Description:
I want export xls included single quotes to excel file when the datatype is string.

the code is :
$objPHPExcel->getActiveSheet()->setCellValueExplicit('A1', "name",PHPExcel_Cell_DataType::TYPE_STRING);

but the excel haven't the "'" in A1 cell.

than I use the other code id :

$objPHPExcel->getActiveSheet()->setCellValue('A1', "'name");

but the excel have the "'" in A1 cell,but can't hidden.

What I want is the attachments.
WorkItem.Summary: export xls included single quotes to excel file
